name: Osaurus Fetch
description: HTTP client for fetching web content and making API requests

tools.name: fetch
tools.description: Fetch content from a URL with full HTTP control

tools.name: fetch_json
tools.description: Fetch and parse JSON from a URL

tools.name: fetch_html
tools.description: Fetch HTML content, optionally extracting text

tools.name: download
tools.description: Download a file to Downloads folder
